body_html: @fmassa, the outstanding issue is that the current implementation is significantly slower than the cython implementation (see @vishwakftw's benchmarks). I'm not familiar enough with the pytorch/ATen internals to know why this is / might be the case, so we'll need some input from core pytorch folks.

body: @fmassa, the outstanding issue is that the current implementation is significantly slower than the cython implementation (see @vishwakftw's benchmarks). I'm not familiar enough with the pytorch/ATen internals to know why this is / might be the case, so we'll need some input from core pytorch folks.
